snippet: The Federal Reserve will publish the opinions of its governors and 12 regional presidents in an effort to help guide investors. The initial issue is to be released on Jan. 25.
abstract: Federal Reserve plans to publish the predictions and opinions of its 12 regional presidents in an effort to guide investor expectations and to increase its influence over economic activity.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve will publish the opinions of its governors and 12 regional presidents in an effort to help guide investors. The initial issue is to be released on Jan. 25.

headline.seo: The Fed Will Publish a Forecast on Rate Moves
headline.main: Fed to Publish a Forecast of Rate Moves, Guiding Investors
headline.print_headline: Fed to Publish a Forecast of Rate Moves, Guiding Investors
